hackathon-description-text: #SlackathonMTL consiste à aider les organisations du monde entier à créer de meilleurs environnements de travail en bâtissant un robot Slack qui simplifiera les façons de travailler et augmentera le taux de productivité et de bonheur au travail. Le tout, dans un bureau où l’ambiance est tout simplement incroyable.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Does the app solve a clear problem?
Does the app show a clear innovation in the way it solves that problem?
Is the idea original and creative?

Is the app easy to use? 
Are the features useful and well scoped? 
Is the design engaging for the user?

Can the app reach users on a large scale?
Is there a bigger vision (roadmap) and potential for the future of the app?
Does the app respect the theme of "For a Greater Workplace"?

Did the team deliver a presentation of quality to the judges (quality of keynote/powerpoint, etc)
Is there a landing page / mini-website to showcase the app?
Does the team show a hint of how the app could be marketed to grow its user base?

Did they show they had a strong team that's well-balanced (dev, marketing, design)?
Was the team present to the social gatherings and spread good vibes?
Did they interact in the Slack channels? Were they helpful and cooperative?
If the team is in the top 25% of votes = 1/1 point
